channel.title: Hey moparisthebest, could i talk to you for a bit?
channel.description: Is there anyway you could make a new type of website that jagex has no idea about? I'm not saying it would work but is that an option to keep them from messing with the servers?

item.title: Hey moparisthebest, could i talk to you for a bit?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

owner Ethan:

ur warning me for doing nothing ? … that makes a lot fo sense…

I was warning you not to advertise, because when you say “I have a server!” that’s pretty much telling us that you’re about to saying the IP and port. Not always true, but most of the time it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey moparisthebest, could i talk to you for a bit?
item.dc:creator: @darkdemon501 darkdemon501
item.description:
@darkdemon501 wrote:

[quote=“Death Service®, post:2, topic:130371”]Jagex doesn’t know about many sites, if you make a site , don’t release it out as much like going to everyone saying go to here and there…Jagex will catch onto it. Also jagex will barely do anything to the website as they have no control over it.[/quote] JAGEX has shutdown MANY sites so they DO have some control… They even have some control over youtube… prolly threatens to sue the hoster unless they delete it
